verses.verse: Then Nahash <S%H5176><s%> the Ammonite <S%H5984><s%> came up, <S%H5927><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Jabesh-gilead: <S%H3003><s%> <S%H1568><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Jabesh <S%H3003><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Nahash, <S%H5176><s%> Make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with us, and we will serve <S%H5647><s%> thee.

And Nahash <S%H5176><s%> the Ammonite <S%H5984><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H413><s%> them, On this <S%H2063><s%> condition will I make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant with you, that I may thrust out <S%H5365><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your right <S%H3225><s%> eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and lay <S%H7760><s%> it for a reproach <S%H2781><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Jabesh <S%H3003><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Give us seven <S%H7651><s%> days' <S%H3117><s%> respite, <S%H7503><s%> that we may send <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and then, if <S%H518><s%> there be no man <S%H369><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> us, we will come out <S%H3318><s%> to <S%H413><s%> thee.

Then came <S%H935><s%> the messengers <S%H4397><s%> to Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> of Saul, <S%H7586><s%> and told <S%H1696><s%> the tidings <S%H1697><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of the people: <S%H5971><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> their voices, <S%H6963><s%> and wept. <S%H1058><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> came <S%H935><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the herd <S%H1241><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the field; <S%H7704><s%> and Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> aileth the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> they weep? <S%H1058><s%> And they told <S%H5608><s%> him <S%H853><s%> the tidings <S%H1697><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> of Jabesh. <S%H3003><s%>

And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H6743><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> when he heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> those <S%H428><s%> tidings, <S%H1697><s%> and his anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> greatly. <S%H3966><s%>

And he took <S%H3947><s%> a yoke <S%H6776><s%> of oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and hewed them in pieces, <S%H5408><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> them throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by the hands <S%H3027><s%> of messengers, <S%H4397><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Whosoever <S%H834><s%> cometh not forth <S%H369><s%> <S%H3318><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> Samuel, <S%H8050><s%> so <S%H3541><s%> shall it be done <S%H6213><s%> unto his oxen. <S%H1241><s%> And the fear <S%H6343><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and they came out <S%H3318><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> consent. <S%H376><s%>

And when he numbered <S%H6485><s%> them in Bezek, <S%H966><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand, <S%H505><s%> and the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto the messengers <S%H4397><s%> that came, <S%H935><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> shall ye say <S%H559><s%> unto the men <S%H376><s%> of Jabesh-gilead, <S%H3003><s%> <S%H1568><s%> Tomorrow, <S%H4279><s%> by that time the sun <S%H8121><s%> be hot, <S%H2527><s%> ye shall have <S%H1961><s%> help. <S%H8668><s%> And the messengers <S%H4397><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and showed <S%H5046><s%> it to the men <S%H376><s%> of Jabesh; <S%H3003><s%> and they were glad. <S%H8055><s%>

Therefore the men <S%H376><s%> of Jabesh <S%H3003><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> we will come out <S%H3318><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you, and ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> with us all <S%H3605><s%> that seemeth <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> unto you.

And it was <S%H1961><s%> so on the morrow, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4283><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> in three <S%H7969><s%> companies; <S%H7218><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the host <S%H4264><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> watch, <S%H821><s%> and slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Ammonites <S%H5983><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the heat <S%H2527><s%> of the day: <S%H3117><s%> and it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that they which remained <S%H7604><s%> were scattered, <S%H6327><s%> so that two <S%H8147><s%> of them were not <S%H3808><s%> left <S%H7604><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Samuel, <S%H8050><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> is he that said, <S%H559><s%> Shall Saul <S%H7586><s%> reign <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us? bring <S%H5414><s%> the men, <S%H376><s%> that we may put them to death. <S%H4191><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> There shall not <S%H3808><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath wrought <S%H6213><s%> salvation <S%H8668><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> Come, <S%H1980><s%> and let us go <S%H1980><s%> to Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> and renew <S%H2318><s%> the kingdom <S%H4410><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to Gilgal; <S%H1537><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> they made Saul king <S%H4427><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7586><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in Gilgal; <S%H1537><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> they sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> rejoiced <S%H8055><s%> greatly. <S%H3966><s%>
